response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. However, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $18,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a premium rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 18000}
